widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryTextRunningLine(pos = (20, 10), size = (395, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 1 is the text menu, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (415, 10), size = (50, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # index 2 is the netx icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 50 }
